type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.ant.AntTarget
type.description: A task which executes an Ant target.

method.name: getBaseDir
method.description: Returns the Ant project base directory to use when executing the target.

method.name: getTarget
method.description: Returns the Ant target to execute.

method.name: setBaseDir
method.description: Sets the Ant project base directory to use when executing the target.

method.name: setTarget
method.description: Sets the Ant target to execute.

property.name: baseDir
property.description: Returns the Ant project base directory to use when executing the target.

property.name: target
property.description: Returns the Ant target to execute.
